page.title: 13THE FOLK FESTIVAL
page.content: In June every year on the 15th 16th and 17th there is a Folk Festival.My dad helps, also my mum does some stewarding.Sometimes or rather for the last 2 or 3 years I have been helping to put up the bunting I also help to sell the programmes,which are being sold for 35p.The Folk Festival is an exciting time for the people that come,and also for the local village people.There are lots of activities during the weekend and plenty of things for children to do. At night there are concerts and ceilidhs. The trouble is there are lots of things going at once so you can't go to all of the activities.For younger children there are dances and songs; face painting, clowns and puppets. The boys from our school do displays of sword dancing. Morris men and other dancers perform in the square.
